mapper.select: SELECT sum(if(isnull(time), 0, time) + if(isnull(time_vacation), 0, time_vacation)) FROM detailfinalschedule dfs, schedule s, usertask ut WHERE dfs.id_schedule = s.id and (ut.isabsence = 0 or ut.recorded = 1) and dfs.task = ut.id and s.user = #{id_user} and date(s.date_schedule) >= date(#{date_from}) and date(s.date_schedule) <= date(#{date_to})

select sum(d_1.time) from schedule s_1, detailfinalschedule d_1 where s_1.user = #{id_user} and s_1.id = d_1.id_schedule and s_1.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule_to} and s_1.date_schedule >= #{date_schedule_from}

SELECT COUNT(s.id) FROM schedule s, usershift us WHERE (1 = 1) AND (s.break_force = 1 OR (s.break_ex = 0 AND (us.break_shift = 1 OR us.waitbreak_shift = 1 OR us.recorded = 1 OR us.disease_shift = 1 OR us.accident_shift = 1 ) ) ) AND s.user = #{user_id} AND s.shift = us.id AND s.date_schedule >= DATE(#{date_from}) AND s.date_schedule <= DATE(#{date_to})

SELECT d.id_ship, sh.name, d.shift AS shift_no, d.crane, d.board, s.user, d.time_from, d.time_to FROM detailfinalschedule d, schedule s, ship sh WHERE (1 = 1) AND d.id_ship = sh.id AND s.id = d.id_schedule AND s.date_schedule = #{date} order by d.time_from desc

SELECT CONCAT(u.lastname, ' ', u.firstname) AS user, u.employee_identification AS employee_identification, dfs.id, s.id AS id_schedule, dfs.shift, dfs.id_ship, dfs.crane AS crane, s.shift AS shift_type, dfs.task, dfs.time, dfs.time_vacation, dfs.time_from, dfs.time_to, dfs.board, dfs.reviewshift, dfs.rif_sws, s.date_schedule, s.note, u.id AS id_user, u.daywork_w, u.hourswork_w, (SELECT CONCAT(temp_1.lastname, ' ', temp_1.firstname) FROM user temp_1 WHERE temp_1.id = s.editor) AS editor, (SELECT CONCAT(temp_1.lastname, ' ', temp_1.firstname) FROM user temp_1 WHERE temp_1.id = s.controller) AS controller, (SELECT t.code FROM user_usertask uut, usertask t WHERE uut.id_usertask = t.id AND uut.id_user = u.id AND uut.task_default = 1) AS defaultTask, dfs.continueshift FROM detailfinalschedule dfs, schedule s, user u WHERE dfs.id_schedule = s.id AND u.id = s.user
and (s.date_schedule = #{date_schedule})
and (dfs.shift = #{shift_number})
and (dfs.id_ship = #{idShip})
ORDER BY dfs.shift ASC

SELECT s.id, u.id AS user, u.employee_identification AS employee_identification, s.shift, s.date_schedule, CONCAT(u.lastname, '', u.firstname) AS name_user, s.editor, s.controller, s.break_ex, s.break_force, s.note FROM user u, schedule s WHERE (u.id = s.user)
AND (s.date_schedule >= #{date_from} AND s.date_schedule <= #{date_to})
AND (u.firstname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') OR u.lastname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') OR u.employee_identification = #{my_full_text_search})
AND (s.date_schedule >= #{date_from} AND s.date_schedule <= #{date_to})
and (s.shift = #{shift_number})
order by u.lastname asc, s.date_schedule

select dfs.id_ship, dfs.board, s.name, sum(dfs.time) as time, sum(dfs.time_vacation) as time_vacation FROM ship s, detailfinalschedule dfs, schedule sc WHERE sc.id = dfs.id_schedule and dfs.id_ship is not null and s.id = dfs.id_ship
and (s.name like CONCAT('%', #{shipname},'%'))
and s.shiptype like CONCAT('%',#{shipType},'%')
and s.line like CONCAT('%',#{shipLine},'%')
and s.shipcondition like CONCAT('%',#{shipCondition},'%')
and (sc.date_schedule >= #{date_from} and sc.date_schedule <= #{date_to})
and sc.date_schedule = #{date_from}
and sc.date_schedule = #{date_to}
group by dfs.id_ship order by s.name

select count(distinct u.id) from user u, user u1, user u2, usertask ut, schedule s left outer join detailinitialschedule dfs on (dfs.id_schedule = s.id) where ut.id=dfs.task and ut.isabsence=0 and s.user = u.id and s.editor=u1.id and s.controller = u2.id
and (u.firstname like CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') or u.lastname like CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') or u.employee_identification = #{my_full_text_search})
and (s.date_schedule >= #{date_from} and s.date_schedule <= #{date_to})
and (dfs.shift = #{shift_number})
and (s.shift = #{shift_type})
and (dfs.task = #{task_id})
and (dfs.task is null)
order by u.lastname, s.date_schedule, dfs.shift asc

SELECT CONCAT(u.lastname, ' ', u.firstname) AS user, u.employee_identification AS employee_identification, dfs.id, s.id AS id_schedule, dfs.shift, dfs.id_ship, dfs.crane AS crane, s.shift AS shift_type, dfs.task, dfs.time, dfs.time_vacation, dfs.time_from, dfs.time_to, dfs.board, dfs.reviewshift, dfs.rif_sws, s.date_schedule, s.note, s.mobile_note, u.id AS id_user, u.daywork_w, u.hourswork_w, dfs.mobile_user, (SELECT CONCAT(temp_1.lastname, ' ', temp_1.firstname) FROM user temp_1 WHERE temp_1.id = s.editor) AS editor, (SELECT CONCAT(temp_1.lastname, ' ', temp_1.firstname) FROM user temp_1 WHERE temp_1.id = s.controller) AS controller, (SELECT t.code FROM user_usertask uut, usertask t WHERE uut.id_usertask = t.id AND uut.id_user = u.id AND uut.task_default = 1) AS defaultTask, dfs.continueshift FROM user u, (SELECT scd.id, scd.shift, scd.date_schedule, scd.note, scd.editor, scd.controller, scd.user, uss.presence FROM schedule scd LEFT OUTER JOIN usershift uss ON (scd.shift = uss.id)) s LEFT OUTER JOIN detailfinalschedule dfs ON (dfs.id_schedule = s.id) WHERE s.user = u.id
AND (u.firstname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') OR u.lastname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') OR u.employee_identification = #{my_full_text_search})
and (dfs.shift = #{shift_number})
AND (s.date_schedule >= #{date_from} AND s.date_schedule <= #{date_to})
and (s.shift = #{shift_type})
and (dfs.task = #{task_id})
and (dfs.task is null)
and (dfs.reviewshift = #{reviewshift})
AND (crane like CONCAT('%', #{craneId}, '%') )
and (dfs.id_ship = #{idShip})
and (dfs.id_ship is null)
and (dfs.rif_sws = #{rif_sws})
and (dfs.id is not null)
ORDER BY u.lastname , s.date_schedule , dfs.shift , dfs.time_from ASC

SELECT CONCAT(u.lastname, ' ', u.firstname) AS user, u.employee_identification AS employee_identification, u.id AS id_user, dfs.id, s.id AS id_schedule, dfs.shift, s.shift AS shift_type, dfs.task, dfs.time, dfs.time_vacation, dfs.time_from, dfs.time_to, s.date_schedule, s.note, s.mobile_note, (SELECT CONCAT(temp_1.lastname, ' ', temp_1.firstname) FROM user temp_1 WHERE temp_1.id = s.editor) AS editor, (SELECT CONCAT(temp_1.lastname, ' ', temp_1.firstname) FROM user temp_1 WHERE temp_1.id = s.controller) AS controller, (SELECT t.code FROM user_usertask uut, usertask t WHERE uut.id_usertask = t.id AND uut.id_user = u.id AND uut.task_default = 1) AS defaultTask FROM user u, schedule s LEFT OUTER JOIN detailinitialschedule dfs ON (dfs.id_schedule = s.id) WHERE s.user = u.id
AND (u.firstname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') OR u.lastname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') OR u.employee_identification = #{my_full_text_search})
AND (s.date_schedule >= #{date_from} AND s.date_schedule <= #{date_to})
and (dfs.shift = #{shift_number})
and (s.shift = #{shift_type})
and (dfs.task = #{task_id})
and (dfs.task is null)
and (dfs.id is not null)
order by u.lastname, s.date_schedule, dfs.shift, dfs.time_from asc

select max(d.date_schedule) as date_break from schedule d, usershift s where d.date_schedule >= #{date_schedule_from} and d.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule_to} and s.break_shift = 1 and d.shift = s.id and d.id_user = #{id_user}

select s.date_schedule from schedule s, usershift us where s.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule_to} and s.date_schedule >= #{date_schedule_from} and s.user = #{id_user} and s.shift = us.id and us.presence = 1 order by s.date_schedule asc

select d_1.shift, sum(d_1.time) / (select sum(d_2.time) as global_sum from schedule s_2, detailinitialschedule d_2 where s_2.user = #{id_user} and s_2.id = d_2.id_schedule and (s_2.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule} and s_2.date_schedule >= #{date_from})) * 100 as rate from schedule s_1, detailinitialschedule d_1 where s_1.user = #{id_user} and s_1.id = d_1.id_schedule and (s_1.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule} and s_1.date_schedule >= #{date_from}) group by d_1.shift order by rate asc

select d_1.shift, sum(d_1.time) / (select sum(d_2.time) as global_sum from schedule s_2, detailfinalschedule d_2 where s_2.user = #{id_user} and s_2.id = d_2.id_schedule and (s_2.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule} and s_2.date_schedule >= #{date_from})) * 100 as rate from schedule s_1, detailfinalschedule d_1 where s_1.user = #{id_user} and s_1.id = d_1.id_schedule and (s_1.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule} and s_1.date_schedule >= #{date_from}) group by d_1.shift order by rate asc

select count(distinct ds.date_schedule) from schedule ds, usershift us, detailfinalschedule dfs where dfs.id_schedule = ds.id and ds.shift = us.id and us.presence = 1 and dfs.time <> 0 and DAYOFWEEK(ds.date_schedule) = 1 and ds.user = #{id_user} and ds.date_schedule >= #{date_from} and ds.date_schedule <= #{date_to}

select dfs.shift as shift, count(distinct ds.date_schedule) rate from schedule ds, usershift us, detailfinalschedule dfs where dfs.id_schedule = ds.id and ds.shift = us.id and us.presence = 1 and dfs.time <> 0 and DAYOFWEEK(ds.date_schedule) = 1 and ds.user = #{id_user} and ds.date_schedule >= #{date_from} and ds.date_schedule <= #{date_to} group by shift order by shift

select dfs.shift as shift, count(distinct ds.date_schedule) rate from schedule ds, usershift us, detailinitialschedule dfs where dfs.id_schedule = ds.id and ds.shift = us.id and us.presence = 1 and dfs.time <> 0 and DAYOFWEEK(ds.date_schedule) = 1 and ds.user = #{id_user} and ds.date_schedule >= #{date_from} and ds.date_schedule <= #{date_to} group by shift order by shift

select count(distinct ss.date_schedule) from schedule ss, usershift uss, detailfinalschedule dfss where dfss.id_schedule = ss.id and dfss.time <> 0 and ss.date_schedule >= #{date_from} and ss.date_schedule <= #{date_to} and ss.user = #{id_user} and ss.shift = uss.id and uss.presence = 1 and (date_format(ss.date_schedule, '%m-%d') in (${days_hol}))

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volume, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volume, 0)) AS containerInvoice, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volumeunderboard_sws, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volumeunderboard_sws, 0)) AS containerRZ_TW_SWS, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volume_tw_mct, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volume_tw_mct, 0)) AS containerRZ_TW_MCT, dfs.invoicing_cycle AS monthInvoice FROM detailfinalscheduleship dfs, detailscheduleship dis, scheduleship s WHERE dfs.invoicing_cycle IS NOT NULL AND dfs.iddetailscheduleship = dis.id AND s.id = dis.idscheduleship AND YEAR(dis.shiftdate) = #{year} AND s.id_service = #{idService} GROUP BY monthInvoice;

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volume, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volume, 0)) AS containerInvoice, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volumeunderboard_sws, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volumeunderboard_sws, 0)) AS containerRZ_TW_SWS, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volume_tw_mct, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volume_tw_mct, 0)) AS containerRZ_TW_MCT, MONTH(dis.shiftdate) AS monthInvoice FROM detailfinalscheduleship dfs, detailscheduleship dis, scheduleship s WHERE dfs.iddetailscheduleship = dis.id AND YEAR(dis.shiftdate) = #{year} AND s.id = dis.idscheduleship AND s.id_service = #{idService} GROUP BY monthInvoice;

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volume, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volume, 0)) AS containerInvoice, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.timework, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_timework, 0)) AS timework, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volumeunderboard_sws, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volumeunderboard_sws, 0)) AS containerRZ_TW_SWS, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volume_tw_mct, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volume_tw_mct, 0)) AS containerRZ_TW_MCT, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.menwork_activityh, 0)) AS menwork_h, SUM(IFNULL(dis.menwork, 0)) AS menwork_nh, dfs.invoicing_cycle AS monthInvoice FROM detailfinalscheduleship dfs, detailscheduleship dis, scheduleship s WHERE dfs.invoicing_cycle IS NOT NULL AND dfs.iddetailscheduleship = dis.id AND s.id = dis.idscheduleship AND YEAR(dis.shiftdate) = #{year} AND s.id_service = #{idService} GROUP BY monthInvoice;

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volume, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volume, 0)) AS containerInvoice, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.timework, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_timework, 0)) AS timework, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volumeunderboard_sws, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volumeunderboard_sws, 0)) AS containerRZ_TW_SWS, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.volume_tw_mct, 0) - IFNULL(dfs.franchise_volume_tw_mct, 0)) AS containerRZ_TW_MCT, SUM(IFNULL(dfs.menwork_activityh, 0)) AS menwork_h, SUM(IFNULL(dis.menwork, 0)) AS menwork_nh, MONTH(dis.shiftdate) AS monthInvoice FROM detailfinalscheduleship dfs, detailscheduleship dis, scheduleship s WHERE dfs.iddetailscheduleship = dis.id AND YEAR(dis.shiftdate) = #{year} AND s.id = dis.idscheduleship AND s.id_service = #{idService} GROUP BY monthInvoice;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) AS countService, dfs.invoicing_cycle AS monthInvoice FROM detailfinalscheduleship dfs, detailscheduleship dis, scheduleship s WHERE dfs.invoicing_cycle IS NOT NULL AND dfs.iddetailscheduleship = dis.id AND s.id = dis.idscheduleship AND YEAR(dis.shiftdate) = #{year} AND s.id_service = #{idService} AND dis.worked = 1 GROUP BY monthInvoice;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) AS countService, MONTH(dis.shiftdate) AS monthInvoice FROM detailscheduleship dis, scheduleship s WHERE YEAR(dis.shiftdate) = #{year} AND s.id = dis.idscheduleship AND s.id_service = #{idService} AND dis.worked = 1 GROUP BY monthInvoice;

SELECT dtf.task AS task_id, CONCAT(t.code, ' - ', t.description) AS task_code, MONTH(s.date_schedule) AS month_date, SUM(dtf.time) AS task_hour FROM detailfinalschedule dtf, schedule s, usertask t WHERE t.id = dtf.task AND s.id = dtf.id_schedule AND YEAR(s.date_schedule) = #{year} GROUP BY task_id , month_date ORDER BY task_id , month_date
